snippet.title: Spyrazoid Bundle - Rounds 1.01-2.04 Full Gameplay
snippet.description:
Introducing Spyrazoid, a minimalist puzzle game available on the iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/spyrazoid/id1585455563

In Spyrazoid Bundle, you spin hexagons until every hexagon's colors match the target 6-color pattern.  Might be easy with 2 colors, but as the game throws more colors at you, your head will spin trying to keep track of which color goes where.  And with 120 pre-programmed boards, the fun never ends.  How many rounds can you complete?

00:00 - Round 1.01
00:48 - Round 1.02
01:19 - Round 1.03
02:31 - Round 1.04
03:26 - Round 2.01
05:25 - Round 2.02
07:04 - Round 2.03
07:45 - Round 2.04

Directions: https://spyraverse.com/spyrazoid/?mode=bundle

Also follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @spyraverse

#Spyrazoid #Spyraverse #gaming #mobilegames #mobilegaming #iosgames #ios #hypercasual #newgames
